verses.verse: "Moreover you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> with ten <S%H6235><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen <S%H8336><s%> and blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material;] you shall make <S%H6213><s%> them with cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman. <S%H2803><s%>

"The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> shall be twenty-eight cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the width <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have the same <S%H259><s%> measurements. <S%H4060><s%>

"Five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall be joined <S%H2266><s%> to one <S%H802><s%> another; <S%H259><s%> and [the other] five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> [shall be] joined <S%H2266><s%> to one <S%H802><s%> another. <S%H259><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> loops <S%H9234><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the outermost <S%H259><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7098><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> in the [first] set, <S%H2279><s%> and likewise <S%H3651><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> [them] on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outermost <S%H7020><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> set. <S%H4225><s%>

"You shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H9234><s%> in the one <S%H259><s%> curtain, <S%H3407><s%> and you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H9234><s%> on the edge <S%H7097><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is in the second <S%H8145><s%> set; <S%H4225><s%> the loops <S%H9234><s%> shall be opposite <S%H6901><s%> each <S%H802><s%> other. <S%H259><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and join <S%H2266><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> to one <S%H802><s%> another <S%H259><s%> with the clasps, <S%H7165><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> may be a unit. <S%H259><s%>

"Then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> of goats' [hair] for a tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the tabernacle; <S%H4908><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> in all.

"The length <S%H753><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> [shall be] thirty <S%H7970><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and the width <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> four <S%H702><s%> cubits; <S%H520><s%> the eleven <S%H6249><s%> <S%H6240><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> shall have the same <S%H259><s%> measurements. <S%H4060><s%>

"And you shall join <S%H2266><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and the [other] six <S%H8337><s%> curtains <S%H3407><s%> by themselves, <S%H905><s%> and you shall double <S%H3717><s%> over <S%H3717><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> at the front <S%H6440><s%> of the tent. <S%H168><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H9234><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is outermost <S%H7020><s%> in the [first] set, <S%H2279><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> loops <S%H9234><s%> on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the curtain <S%H3407><s%> [that is outermost in] the second <S%H8145><s%> set. <S%H2279><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> clasps <S%H7165><s%> of bronze, <S%H5178><s%> and you shall put <S%H935><s%> the clasps <S%H7165><s%> into the loops <S%H9234><s%> and join <S%H2266><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> together, <S%H2266><s%> that it may be a unit. <S%H259><s%>

"And the overlapping <S%H5629><s%> part <S%H5629><s%> that is left <S%H5736><s%> over <S%H5736><s%> in the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> the half <S%H2677><s%> curtain <S%H3407><s%> that is left <S%H5736><s%> over, <S%H5736><s%> shall lap <S%H5628><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the back <S%H268><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

"And the cubit <S%H520><s%> on one <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H2088><s%> and the cubit <S%H520><s%> on the other, <S%H2088><s%> of what is left <S%H5736><s%> over <S%H5736><s%> in the length <S%H753><s%> of the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> shall lap <S%H5628><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the sides <S%H6654><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> on one <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H2088><s%> and on the other, <S%H2088><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> it.

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a covering <S%H4372><s%> for the tent <S%H168><s%> of rams' skins <S%H5785><s%> dyed <S%H119><s%> red, <S%H119><s%> and a covering <S%H4372><s%> of porpoise <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%> above. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%>
"Then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> upright. <S%H5975><s%>

"Ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> [shall be] the length <S%H753><s%> of each board, <S%H7175><s%> and one and a half <S%H2677><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> the width <S%H7341><s%> of each <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

"There [shall be] two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> board, <S%H7175><s%> fitted <S%H7947><s%> to one <S%H802><s%> another; <S%H259><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>
"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> for the tabernacle: <S%H4908><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the south <S%H8486><s%> side. <S%H6285><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons <S%H3027><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> for its two <S%H8147><s%> tenons; <S%H3027><s%>
and for the second <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side, <S%H6285><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> boards, <S%H7175><s%>

and their forty <S%H705><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver; <S%H3701><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>
"And for the rear <S%H3411><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> to the west, <S%H3220><s%> you shall make <S%H6213><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> boards. <S%H7175><s%>
"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> for the corners <S%H4740><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> at the rear. <S%H3411><s%>

"And they shall be double <S%H8382><s%> beneath, <S%H4295><s%> and together <S%H9191><s%> they shall be complete <S%H8535><s%> to its top <S%H7218><s%> to the first <S%H259><s%> ring; <S%H2885><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> it shall be with both <S%H8147><s%> of them: they shall form <S%H1961><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> corners. <S%H4740><s%>

"And there shall be eight <S%H8083><s%> boards <S%H7175><s%> with their sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> sockets; <S%H134><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> one <S%H259><s%> board <S%H7175><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> another <S%H259><s%> board. <S%H7175><s%>

"Then you shall make <S%H6213><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> wood, <S%H6086><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%>

and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> for the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> for the rear <S%H3411><s%> [side] to the west. <S%H3220><s%>
"And the middle <S%H8484><s%> bar <S%H1280><s%> in the center <S%H8432><s%> of the boards <S%H7175><s%> shall pass <S%H1272><s%> through <S%H1272><s%> from end <S%H7097><s%> to end. <S%H7097><s%>

"And you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> with gold <S%H2091><s%> and make <S%H6213><s%> their rings <S%H2885><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> [as] holders <S%H1004><s%> for the bars; <S%H1280><s%> and you shall overlay <S%H6823><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> with gold. <S%H2091><s%>
"Then you shall erect <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> according to its plan <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have been shown <S%H7200><s%> in the mountain. <S%H2022><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a veil <S%H6532><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material] and fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen; <S%H8336><s%> it shall be made <S%H6213><s%> with cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a skillful <S%H2803><s%> workman. <S%H2803><s%>

"And you shall hang <S%H5414><s%> it on four <S%H702><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> overlaid <S%H6823><s%> with gold, <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> [also being of] gold, <S%H2091><s%> on four <S%H702><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of silver. <S%H3701><s%>

"And you shall hang <S%H5414><s%> up the veil <S%H6532><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the clasps, <S%H7165><s%> and shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> within <S%H1004><s%> the veil; <S%H6532><s%> and the veil <S%H6532><s%> shall serve <S%H914><s%> for you as a partition <S%H914><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> place and the holy <S%H6944><s%> of holies. <S%H6944><s%>
"And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy <S%H3727><s%> seat <S%H3727><s%> on the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> of holies. <S%H6944><s%>

"And you shall set <S%H7760><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the veil, <S%H6532><s%> and the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> opposite <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the side <S%H6763><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> toward the south; <S%H8486><s%> and you shall put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side. <S%H6763><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> a screen <S%H4539><s%> for the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> and scarlet <S%H8144><s%> [material] and fine <S%H8336><s%> twisted <S%H7806><s%> linen, <S%H8336><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> of a weaver. <S%H7551><s%>

"And you shall make <S%H6213><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> pillars <S%H5982><s%> of acacia <S%H7848><s%> for the screen, <S%H4539><s%> and overlay <S%H6823><s%> them with gold, <S%H2091><s%> their hooks <S%H2053><s%> [also being of] gold; <S%H2091><s%> and you shall cast <S%H3332><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> sockets <S%H134><s%> of bronze <S%H5178><s%> for them.
